prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with vibrant colors and an impressive wingspan.
I want a flying-type Pokemon that embodies grace and speed during flight.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a blue and red swallow with striking features.
Make an agile Pokemon that can soar through the skies effortlessly.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sleek body and a colorful plumage for battle.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and showcases its swift flying ability.
Show me a Pokemon known for its intelligence and adaptability in various environments.
